      Item Companion.getGift()
      Returns the gift of this Companion.
      Item Dungeon.getItem(java.lang.String primaryItemName)
      Get the Item object whose primary name is passed.
      Item Vendor.trade(int price)
      Will return the Item purchesed whent he correct amount of money is given.
      Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type Item 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Dungeon.add(Item item)
      Adds an item to the dungeon items list.
      void Dungeon.removeItemFromGame(Item item)
      This is a helper method which effectively removes and Item object from the game - by removing it from the db holding Items linked to the Dungeon.
      int Vendor.trade(Item offer)
      Will refund the player the money equal to the value of the Item given.
